setmeup 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Fix column names

fix_colnames.Rd

Change column names to snake case.

Usage

fix_colnames(x)

Arguments

x

A vector of column names.

Value

A character vector the same length as x.

Examples

s <- paste(
  "Some words and stuff plus punctuation",
  ". , : ; ? ! / * @ # - _ \" ' [ ] { } ( )",
  "And symbols",
  "| ` = + ^ ~ < > $",
  "And these",
  "% &",
  "checkThisCamelCase",
  "Letters674next0to827654digits4",
  "THIS/THAT"
)

fix_colnames(s)
#> Warning: PCRE pattern compilation error
#> 	'lookbehind assertion is not fixed length'
#> 	at '(?<=[2-9]?1)_(?=st(\b|_))|(?<=[2-9]?2)_(?=nd(\b|_))|(?<=[2-9]?3)_(?=rd(\b|_))|(?<=[1-9]?[4-9])_(?=th(\b|_))|(?<=[1-9]0{0,10}0)_(?=th(\b|_))'
#> Error in gsub(gsub(gsub(gsub(gsub(gsub(gsub(gsub(x, pattern = "\\s", replacement = "_"),     pattern = "([[:lower:]])([[:upper:]])", replacement = "\\1_\\2"),     pattern = "(\\d)([[:alpha:]])", replacement = "\\1_\\2"),     pattern = "([[:alpha:]])(\\d)", replacement = "\\1_\\2"),     pattern = "/", replacement = "_or_"), pattern = chars, replacement = ""),     pattern = "_{2,}", replacement = "_"), pattern = ordinals,     replacement = "", perl = TRUE): invalid regular expression '(?<=1[1-3])_(?=th(\b|_))|(?<=[2-9]?1)_(?=st(\b|_))|(?<=[2-9]?2)_(?=nd(\b|_))|(?<=[2-9]?3)_(?=rd(\b|_))|(?<=[1-9]?[4-9])_(?=th(\b|_))|(?<=[1-9]0{0,10}0)_(?=th(\b|_))'
